scripts.ci-package: mkdir -p extension/dist && yarn run -B vsce package --no-dependencies --yarn --cwd extension --githubBranch main/extension --out extension/dist
scripts.clean: yarn run -B del extension/build extension/dist extension/work
scripts.package: yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn ci-package
scripts.publish-vsce: yarn run -B vsce publish --no-dependencies --yarn --cwd extension --githubBranch main/extension
scripts.repatch: git add -- package.json && yarn patch-commit -s "$1" && git checkout -- package.json && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-all: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn upgrade-packages' && false
scripts.upgrade-packages: yarn up '**' '@types/vscode@=1.75' && yarn up -R '**' && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-yarn-itself: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn clean-install' && false
